DocAttribute.Name: UpperBoundValue
DocAttribute.Documentation: Upper bound value for the interval defining the property value. If the value is not given, it indicates an open bound (all values to be greater than or equal to _LowerBoundValue_).

DocAttribute.Name: LowerBoundValue
DocAttribute.Documentation: Lower bound value for the interval defining the property value. If the value is not given, it indicates an open bound (all values to be lower than or equal to _UpperBoundValue_).

DocAttribute.Name: Unit
DocAttribute.Documentation: Unit for the upper and lower bound values, if not given, the default value for the measure type is used as defined by the global unit assignment at _IfcProject.UnitInContext_. The applicable unit is then selected by the underlying TYPE of the _UpperBoundValue_, _LowerBoundValue_, and _SetPointValue_)

DocAttribute.Name: SetPointValue

DocWhereRule.Name: SameUnitUpperLower
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The measure type of the _UpperBoundValue_ shall be the same as the measure type of the _LowerBoundValue_, if both (upper and lower bound) are given.

DocWhereRule.Name: SameUnitUpperSet
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The measure type of the _UpperBoundValue_ shall be the same as the measure type of the _SetPointValue_, if both (upper bound and set point) are given.

DocWhereRule.Name: SameUnitLowerSet
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The measure type of the _LowerBoundValue_ shall be the same as the measure type of the _SetPointValue_, if both (lower bound and set point) are given.
